mapper.sql: id, user_id, plan_name, plan_type, target_duration_days, target_calories_per_day, description, status, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO health_training_plan ( id, user_id, plan_name, plan_type, target_duration_days, target_calories_per_day, description, status, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{planName}, #{planType}, #{targetDurationDays}, #{targetCaloriesPerDay}, #{description}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, IFNULL(#{createdAt}, NOW()), IFNULL(#{updatedAt}, NOW()) )
mapper.update: UPDATE health_training_plan SET plan_name = #{planName}, plan_type = #{planType}, target_duration_days = #{targetDurationDays}, target_calories_per_day = #{targetCaloriesPerDay}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, updated_at = IFNULL(#{updatedAt}, NOW()) WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
